attributes.action: Loss of free movement for Roadies, Transport Drivers and Technicians in Europe.
attributes.additional_details: It will also effect television British Outside Broadcast company’s who provide facilities at European sporting contests, and for the many British world leading Lighting, Sound, Video, Staging, Catering, Set Design company’s and all of their incredibly experienced staff and technicians who face a very bleak future without proper negotiation with Europe.
attributes.background: A cross party discussion with the European Parliament to negotiate the recognition of being able to work and drive on all Live Events within Europe without the restrictions imposed from Brexit.
